thread.title: K-Stew poses nude in sizzling shoot
thread.title_full: K-Stew poses nude in sizzling shoot

title: K-Stew poses nude in sizzling shoot
text:
Kristen Stewart goes nearly nude for Mario Testino’s ‘Towel Series’ Network Writers News Corp Australia Network Kristen Stewart goes nearly nude for Mario Testino’s ‘Towel Series’ Network Writers News Corp Australia Network Sultry ... Kristen Stewart has stripped off for Mario Testino. Picture: Ian Gavan/Getty Images 
SHE is known for keeping her cards close to her chest, but now Kristen Stewart has bared all in a revealing photo shoot. 
The Twilight star posed for photographer Mario Testino’s Towel Series, wearing nothing but a strategically placed towel. 
Testino shared the stunning black-and-white portrait on his Instagram page on Thursday. Kristen Stewart 
Stewart’s portrait is the 91st in the photographer’s provocative and exclusive sequence of images. 
“The Towel Series is a private club,” the renowned snapper told Vogue last year. “I choose very carefully who I photograph for it — it is only my point of view, no one else has a say in it.” 
Stewart, 25, follows in the footsteps of Anna Wintour, Justin Bieber and Gigi Hadid who have previously posed for Testino. Other Stories
